thread.section_title: The Towers at Lotte New York Palace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Surprise!!
thread.title_full: Nice Surprise!! - Review of The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: zacake
title: Nice Surprise!!
text:
This was our first stay at The Palace and we won't stay anywhere else in NYC. On top of the best location and beautiful rooms, the staff was out of this world. They knew the names of our children, served wonderful food, and they even carted our bags 2 blocks to the Uber when the streets were closed down for St. Patrick's day parade.
Thank you Palace Hotel for a wonderful trip!
